name: Will Chen
tagline: I dedicated to providing professional high-quality online translation services.
body:
# Welcome!

As a professional translator with experience in Chinese, Japanese and English, I think you'll find I have the skills you're looking for.

Customers can send me via e-mail (toptranslation247@outlook.com) the file need to be translated (file formats including txt, po, pot, docx, odt, doc, odp, ppt, xlf, pdf, png, gif, jpg, jpeg, xml), I will in the shortest possible time to give you a quotation. Once you agree and payment completion for this service, I will begin translation work, you receive your translation via email.

My Skype:yungayii

My E-mail: toptranslation247@outlook.com

I am looking forward to your reply!

# ABOUT ME

![manbuilding](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10449179/5716378/62eacbc8-9aa2-11e4-9dd7-e8cd1ebc6110.jpg)

[My Odesk profile and Work History and Feedback](https://www.odesk.com/users/~017b0ff90465b63d1b): https://www.odesk.com/users/~017b0ff90465b63d1b

I have been providing Chinese, Japanese and English translation services since 2011 for clients ranging from large corporations to private individuals.

I provide professional translations of Chinese, Japanese and English and vice versa. I also offer proofreading and editing services. I have solid experience translating everything from technical user manuals to legal contracts to websites, I also have multiple references and additional samples available on request.

Every document that I translate will be proofread with meticulous detail to ensure the utmost accuracy and quality, and I will firmly calibrate your text for the particular technical field, desired tone and target audience.

Normally I can translate about 500 words/characters on an easy text or 350 words/characters on a complicated text in an hour, and I am familiar with MemoQ.

I dedicated to providing professional high-quality online translation services.

I offer a 100% satisfaction, money-back guarantee to all clients. 

Price: $0.07-$0.10 per source word/character base on content.


# Work Feedback

“Will has been great to work with on translating content from English to both Japanese and Chinese.” 

"Will was very reliable person, this time we had really tight schedule and only could give him 2 days to complete the work.

But he finished in a one day. 
We had plenty of time to use that data to prepare other document, 

Definitely recommended."

"Will is very professional and knowledgeable.   His translations were exceptional.  He followed through with every deadline and provide excellent guidance and feedback."

"Chen gave clear explanations and did the translation in record time. Will ask his advice on Chinese related topics."
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
